response.overview: Thamizh, a female freedom fighter, is haunted by past tragedies and the recent loss of her husband, leaving her mentally fragile. Her only solace is Neelam, a courageous woman who risks her life to rescue captives. When Thenu, a 6-year-old girl from her neighborhood, goes missing, Thamizh embarks on a mission to find and save her. Suspecting an elderly woman and a gang, Thamizh follows their trail, uncovering shocking secrets about her husbands death along the way. Her relentless pursuit of the truth not only leads her to confront her past but also reveals the fate of Thenu.
response.title: Bommai (An Island Story)
